Header.title: LinkedIn Trending Page
Header.paragraph: Gives all the current trends based upon topics, positive reactions, negative reactions

About.paragraph: This project wants to serve customers with trending topics across scenarios
Why: Serves top posts with positive Reactions
Serves top posts with negative Reactions

Features.title: Get Trending topics
Features.text: Gives all the trending Topics across LinkedIn

Features.title: Get Most Positive Reactions
Features.text: Gives post with most positive Reactions

Features.title: Get Most Negative Reactions
Features.text: Gives post with most Negative Reactions

Features.title: Get all Trends for a topic
Features.text: Gives the trend for a particular topic
